titles.title: A resolution recognizing the importance of "National Drug Facts Chat Day" on November 10, 2009.
A resolution recognizing the importance of "National Drug Facts Chat Day" on November 10, 2009.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Recognizes the importance of National Drug Facts Chat Day. Urges teachers, schools, and students to participate by submitting questions and using the information provided to increase their understanding of the science of drug abuse and addiction among school-aged youth.
